reviewText: It was not clear if it had subtitles or not in the description, so we took a chance that it would have them. Unfortunately, it did not have subtitles. We love Bollywood movies, but we do not know Hindi (or any of the Indian languages) so we look for the comment that it has subtitles in the description. While we have seen these movies before and know the plot, it would have been great to get a copy with subtitles.

I thought I was getting a deal with a 3 in 1 dvd release.  Yes if I could understand Hindi!  This dvd doesn't have subtitles!!!  So i pretty much lost my money!  Seller please note this on future listings!

I love Mujhse Dosti Karoge it is one of my favorite movies so when I saw it as a 3 movie pack I was excited however there are no english subtitiles.  No subtitles at all!  This would be great if I spoke Hindi!
